categories: Category:Years in the Great Peace of the Republic era

nodes.text: The following events took place in or around the year 100 BBY, also known as 3177 LY according to the Lothal Calendar, 81 BFE in the Imperial calendar, and year 7877 in the C.R.C. calendar.

The 2020 reference book The Star Wars Book states that the High Republic Era ended around 100 BBY. However, a later promotional video for the web novel The Vow of Silver Dawn places the latter's events, which occur around 82 BBY, at the end of the High Republic Era.
